          <title>
            <string language="en">Combing your hair creates static electricity</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Kämmen Ihres Haares erstellt statisch 
Elektrizität</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Se peigner les cheveux crée l'électricité 
statique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Combing seu cabelo cría a eletricidade estática</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La pettinatura dei vostri capelli crea 
l'elettricità statica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το κτένισμα της τρίχας σας δημιουργεί τη στατική 
ηλεκτρική ενέργεια</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Peinarse el pelo crea electricidad estática</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows electric charges created in combing your hair.</string>
          </description>
